com.anji.util

Class Reset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anji.util.Reset

  • public class Reset
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to clear all persisted data, including chromosomes and runs in DB, innovation ID data, and log.
    Author:
    Philip Tucker
